summary: fix MatchingSet Perk (LightArmor) when wearing ImperialLight, ImperialStudded, Studded and ElvenGilded Armor also add craft/upgrade-able Studded Helmet, Gauntlets and Boots..
descriptionHtml:
- add ArmorMaterialImperialLight, ArmorMaterialImperialStudded, ArmorMaterialStudded and ArmorMaterialElvenGilded to MatchingSet PERK (hopefuly fixes MatchingSet Perk when wearing these type of armors)
- add craft/upgrade-able Studded Helmet, Gauntlets and Boots (so they can be matched with Studded Armor, use ScaledArmor mesh/texture, Warning! the Helmet is HiDDEN when worn)
- change StuddedArmor LeveledItem and Outfit, so NPC will have these new armor (no more Hide Helmet/Bracers/Boots)

 HiSTORY
1.1 - fix Studded Helmet/Gauntlets/Boots not showing after loading a gamesave
    - change StuddedArmor LeveledItem and Outfit
    - add optional .esp that show studded helmet when worn
1.0 - initial release

 iNCOMPATiBLE
anything that modify MacthingSetPERK and StuddedArmor LeveledItem/Outfit, if u want still benefit from these fixes place it after d umm.. incompatible one :)

 TOOL
..just TESVSnip!

 THANKs
Bethesda, Nexus and TESVSnip..
author: fREAkX
